name: async-limiter
description: asynchronous function queue with adjustable concurrency

1.0.0.name: async-limiter
1.0.0.description: asynchronous function queue with adjustable concurrency

scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

1.0.1.name: async-limiter
1.0.1.description: asynchronous function queue with adjustable concurrency

scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

2.0.0.name: async-limiter
2.0.0.description: asynchronous function queue with adjustable concurrency

scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
